name: Turion Space
long_description: Turion Space is building spacecraft to move things around in space and image space objects when theyâ€™re not, and focused on developing the dual-use technology required to ensure a sustainable future in space. They aim to build a strong foundation selling space domain awareness imagery data while advancing their technology towards an affordable solution for orbital debris removal and eventually asteroid mining. The founding team originates from SpaceX, and after going through the Y-combinator accelerator in summer 2021 went on to raise a $6.2M seed round and is launching their first DROID satellite in early 2023.
one_liner: Moving Things Around in Space, Imaging Space Objects When We're Not
